data.text:
Thank you so much 
Mr Ahad and Mr Sawkat for the good cleaning and your good hospitality I liked the clean room and thank you again both of you Mr Ahad and Mr Sawkat for being a good representative of your hotel and hope for you all the best inshALLAH
data.title: Good cleaning and hospitality

data.text: The staff is great, breakfast is ok not a fanüòÖ‚Ä¶. For 2 star hotel. My mom and daugther enjoy it since the hotel is close to metro and convenient stores, the room is clean, this is our 2nd time on this hotel and we are ok with it‚Ä¶. There staff are well trained (of cors they are kabayan) and very attentive to any of our concern..
data.title: Budget hotel during christmas and Clean üëç

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Guest, 

Greetings from Avenue Hotel. 

Thank you for taking the time to write your review. We are glad that overall you are satisfied with the facilities and services at Avenue Hotel. We pride ourselves in maintaining the highest quality standards for our customers. We appreciate your positive feedback  from the location and comfort of the rooms and the customer service provided. These Positive Feedback will motivate us to serve you better and hope to see you soon again. 

Thank you and kind regards, 

Michelle David 
Director of Sales & Marketing 
Avenue Hotel Dubai
M: +971564014530
E: dos@avenuehoteldubai.com
owner_response.author: Michelle David

data.text: We went to the bar as a walk in guest, bar is not busy /great customer services we had /happy hour is the best offer /pizza is delicious but it takes time to get ready around 35/40minutes/ but few opinions for wines which we wished we could not find it
data.title: Everything was perfect mostly customer service

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:

data.text: Accomodating and nice room. Clean and relaxing. Even we are late check in they are accomodated us. We find a right hotel in the heart of Dubai in AVENUE  Hotel. With music band bar and nice food to experience.
data.title: Excellent

data.text: Hotel location are good near to metro station which is best. Hotel staff are amazing especially reception lady Kathy awesome welcome with wonderful smile. Room is good and clean. Reception lady Kathy make my trip awesome. Will come again
data.title: Amazing staff Kathy

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Guest, 

Greetings from Avenue Hotel Dubai!

Thank you for choosing Avenue Hotel Dubai as your preferred destination and for the wonderful feedback. We are glad to know that our staff has left no stone unturned in making your stay the more comfortable and enjoyable. Your helpful comments are much appreciated, and your feedback will help us to continually improve the standard of facilities and services offered to all our guests. 

We appreciate your positive feedback that encourages us to serve you better and hope to see you soon again.
